text.name: sys_description
text.text: Pygame is a free library that facilitates the development of real-time video games with the Python programming language. Built on the SDL library, it allows programming the multimedia part (graphics, sound and keyboard, mouse or joystick inputs), without encountering the difficulties of low-level languages ​​such as C. In addition to adapting the SDL to Python, it also provides a small number of specific functions to help game developpement. The Quiz game 'Retro Trivia', developed by 'Lbrpdx', is a perfect example of its multimedia possibilities.
